name: Advantage Solutions, Inc.
description: Advantage Solutions, Inc. is a leading provider of outsourced sales and marketing solutions to consumer packaged goods (CPG) companies, retailers, and foodservice operators. Established in 1987, the company has grown to become one of the largest sales and marketing agencies in North America, specializing in sales, digital marketing, and retail merchandising. Advantage Solutions offers a comprehensive suite of services that includes strategic consulting, customer engagement, brand development, and data analytics, empowering brands to enhance their market presence and drive sales growth. With a team of experienced professionals, the company leverages its extensive industry knowledge and insights to create tailored strategies that meet the unique needs of its clients. Advantage Solutions is dedicated to fostering long-term partnerships with its clients, ensuring that they achieve their business objectives in an increasingly competitive marketplace. The company's commitment to innovation and excellence is reflected in its ability to adapt to changing consumer behaviors and market trends, making it a trusted partner for CPG brands and retailers alike. By integrating advanced technologies and data-driven strategies, Advantage Solutions continues to lead the way in transforming how brands connect with consumers and maximize their market impact.
